#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,arr[1000],i,ct,sum1,cnt1,sum2,cnt2,j;
	for(scanf("%d",&t);t--;)
	{
		for(scanf("%d",&n),i=0;i<n;i++) {scanf("%d",&arr[i]);}
		scanf("%d",&ct);
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		
		sum1=sum2=cnt1=cnt2=0;
		for(i=0,j=n-1;(sum1<ct || sum2<ct) && i<=j;)
		{
			if(sum1<sum2) {sum1+=arr[i]; if(sum1<=ct) cnt1++,i++;}
			else {sum2+=arr[j];if(sum2<=ct) cnt2++,j--;}

		}
		printf("%d %d\n",cnt2,cnt1);
	}
}
